SELECT CU_IDX, CU_ID, CU_NAME, TEL_NUM, HP_NUM, OWN_AUTH, to_char(to_date(REG_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS REG_DT, to_char(to_date(LAST_LOG_DT, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS LAST_LOG_DT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, TB.* FROM(SELECT CU_IDX, CU_ID, CU_NAME, TEL_NUM, HP_NUM, OWN_AUTH, REG_DT, LAST_LOG_DT FROM EZ_CMS_USER

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EZ_CMS_USER( CU_IDX, CU_ID, CU_PWD, EMAIL, ZIP, ADDR1, ADDR2, TEL_NUM, HP_NUM, CU_NAME, LAST_LOG_DT, IP, EMAIL_RCV_CHK, YOUNG_AGREE_NAME, PI_AGREE_DT, PI_AGREE_YN, SMS_RCV_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, OWN_AUTH ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CU_IDX),0)+1 FROM EZ_CMS_USER), #{cuId}, #{cuPwd}, #{email}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{telNum}, #{hpNum}, #{cuName}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{ip}, #{emailRcvChk}, #{youngAgreeName}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{piAgreeYn}, #{smsRcvYn}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{regId}, #{ownAuth} )
